entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
